about.name: Prague
about.info_text: Prague, the capital of the Czech Republic, is a city of stunning architecture, rich history, and vibrant culture. Known as the 'City of a Hundred Spires,' Prague's historic Old Town, iconic Charles Bridge, and majestic Prague Castle make it a favorite destination for travelers. Visitors can explore its cobblestone streets, Gothic and Baroque buildings, and experience the charm of this Bohemian city. With a thriving arts scene, world-class cuisine, and a strong coffee culture, Prague is a destination that seamlessly blends the old and the new.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 1.3 million
Country: Czech Republic
Time Zone: Central European Time (UTC+01:00)
Language: Czech
Currency: Czech Koruna (CZK)
about.climate_text: Prague, the capital of the Czech Republic, features a temperate continental climate with four distinct seasons. Summers are warm, with temperatures typically ranging from 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F), while winters can be cold, with temperatures between -2°C and 2°C (28°F to 36°F). Prague experiences a fair amount of precipitation year-round, with snowfall common in the winter months.

attractions_card.title: Prague Castle
attractions_card.description: Visit the largest ancient castle in the world, featuring the stunning St. Vitus Cathedral and the historic Royal Palace.

attractions_card.title: Charles Bridge
attractions_card.description: Stroll across the iconic Charles Bridge, adorned with statues, and enjoy panoramic views of Prague's Old Town and Prague Castle.

attractions_card.title: Old Town Square
attractions_card.description: Experience the heart of Prague in the Old Town Square. Admire the Astronomical Clock and the Gothic Church of Our Lady before Týn.

attractions_card.title: Astronomical Clock
attractions_card.description: Don't miss the famous Astronomical Clock in the Old Town Hall, known for its hourly show with figurines and astronomical dials.

food_card.title: Trdelník
food_card.description: Indulge in trdelník, a traditional Czech sweet pastry, often filled with ice cream or other delicious toppings.

food_card.title: Goulash
food_card.description: Savor a hearty bowl of Czech goulash, a stew made with tender meat and a rich paprika sauce, often served with dumplings.

food_card.title: Pilsner Beer
food_card.description: Enjoy a pint of Pilsner beer, as the Czech Republic is famous for its beer culture. Explore local pubs and breweries.

hotels_card.title: Aria Hotel Prague
hotels_card.description: Stay at the Aria Hotel Prague, a luxurious and music-themed boutique hotel near Prague Castle.

hotels_card.title: BoHo Hotel
hotels_card.description: Experience modern comfort at the BoHo Hotel, conveniently located in the heart of Prague's Old Town.

hotels_card.title: Mandarin Oriental, Prague
hotels_card.description: Enjoy a luxurious stay at the Mandarin Oriental, Prague, housed in a former 14th-century monastery.

transport_card.title: Prague Metro
transport_card.description: The Prague Metro provides efficient transportation around the city. It's a convenient way to reach various attractions.

transport_card.title: Trams and Buses
transport_card.description: Explore Prague using its extensive tram and bus network, which connects various parts of the city.
